title: Diwali Festivities Begin For Stars! Shahid, Sara, Varun And Other Celebs Get Into Party Mode
text:
Diwali Festivities Begin For Stars! Shahid, Sara, Varun And Other Celebs Get Into Party Mode

Diwali Festivities Begin For Stars! Shahid, Sara, Varun And Other Celebs Get Into Party Mode

The season of festivities have just begun and Bollywood celebrities are in a party mode. Like every year, the tradition of Bollywood parties has begun.

On Friday, actor Jackky Bhagnani hosted a house party for his close friends and family. The guest list consisted crème-de-la-crème of Bollywood including Sara Ali Khan, Taapsee Pannu, Shahid Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Varun Dhawan, Arjun Kapoor, Nushrat Bharucha and others at his house. Actors posed for shutterbugs as they entered the venue. Sara Ali Khan was seen in a bright yellow saree and Taapsee looked radiant in her white outfit.

Varun and Shahid were seen following the festive dress code as they came wearing kurtas to ring in Diwali festivities.

Have a look at the pictures right here.
description: The season of festivities have just begun and Bollywood celebrities are in a celebrity mode. Like every year, the tradition of Bollywood parties has begun. On Friday, actor Jackky Bhagnani hosted a house party for his close friends and family. The guest list consisted crème-de-la-crème of Bollywood including Sara Ali Khan, Taapsee Pannu, Shahid Kapoor and others.
